description: This file contains styles for a web application, specifically handling theme management with CSS variables for light and dark themes, and styles for various components such as .App, .App-header, and theme toggles.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application with background color and text color that varies based on the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: The header section of the app styled with flexible alignment and theme-dependent background color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: A button for toggling the theme with styles for transition and hover effects.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: A logo for the application with animation effects applied based on user preferences.
